{{shiremonths}}
'''Blotmath''' (pronounced Blodmath or Blommath) was the eleventh month of the [[Shire Calendar]], approximately corresponding to modern [[22 October]] through [[20 November]]. It was called [[Blooting]] in [[Bree]].<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>

==Etymology==
The name represents a [[Hobbitish|modernisation]] of the [[Old English]] name for November, ''[[wiktionary:blotmonaþ|blotmonaþ]]'', meaning "month of sacrifice".<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.etymonline.com/search?q=November|articlename=Origin and meaning of november by Online Etymology Dictionary|author=Douglas Harper|website=[https://www.etymonline.com/ Online Etymology Dictionary]}}</ref>
